content:
Certainly, here are a few examples of horror films that challenge traditional gender roles:

1. "You're Next" (2011) - This film subverts gender roles by featuring a female protagonist who is skilled in survival and combat tactics, while the male characters are more vulnerable and incompetent.

2. "Raw" (2016) - This French horror film challenges gender stereotypes by portraying a female protagonist who is not sexualized and is instead focused on her academic pursuits in veterinary school.

3. "The Descent" (2005) - This film features an all-female cast of characters who are portrayed as strong and capable in the face of danger, challenging the trope of helpless female victims in horror films.

4. "Jennifer's Body" (2009) - This horror-comedy film features a female protagonist who is a sexually empowered and confident young woman, challenging societal expectations of female sexuality.

5. "A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night" (2014) - This Iranian vampire film features a female vampire who preys on abusive men, challenging gender roles by portraying a female character who takes on a traditionally male role of vigilante justice.
